synopsis.text:
An emotional journey unfolds in the heart of Tokyo during the 1960s, where a young boy named Shin finds himself plunged into despair after losing his mother, his sole family member. Just as his world crumbles, he encounters Itsuki, a boy graphing with the loss of his older sister. Together, they form an unlikely bond with Tae, a girl gifted with the ability to see supernatural creatures known as Yo-kai.

Joined by Shin's guardian spirit Suu-san and an array of new Yo-kai, including the enigmatic Nekomata, this trio embarks on an extraordinary adventure to reclaim the souls of their cherished family members. As they navigate through a labyrinth of mysterious incidents, they rediscover the essence of a loving family.

However, their quest for solace unveils a startling truth that shakes their very existence. This captivating tale serves as the origin story of how Lord Enma ascends to rule the Yomakai, weaving together themes of friendship, family, and the supernatural. Prepare for a rollercoaster of emotions and thrilling revelations in this enchanting anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
